org.apache.giraph.partition

类 PartitionStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.partition.PartitionStats
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    直接已知子类:
    RangePartitionStats

    public class PartitionStats
extends Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    Used to keep track of statistics of every Partition. Contains no actual partition data, only the statistics.

    • 构造器概要

      • PartitionStats

      • PartitionStats

        public PartitionStats(int partitionId,
              long vertexCount,
              long finishedVertexCount,
              long edgeCount,
              long messagesSentCount)
        Constructor with the initial stats.
        参数:
        partitionId - Partition count.
        vertexCount - Vertex count.
        finishedVertexCount - Finished vertex count.
        edgeCount - Edge count.
        messagesSentCount - Number of messages sent
